skyrealm.ban.hacking.name: Hacking
skyrealm.ban.hacking.description: Using 3rd party software to gain privileges or advantages
skyrealm.ban.hacking.reason:
<color:#ff7675>You have been banned for hacking</color>
 
<color:#dfe6e9>BanHash: </color><color:#55efc4>%hash%</color>
<color:#dfe6e9>Duration: </color><color:#74b9ff>%duration%</color>
 
<color:#dfe6e9>If you believe this ban is unfair or wrong, please write us a message!
